mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ks_board_activity WHERE BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_TYPE , A.BOARD_SUB_TYPE , REPLY_NO , REPLY_CONTENT , AR.REG_ID AS REPLY_REG_ID , AR.REG_DTTM AS REPLY_REG_DTTM FROM ks_board_activity A join ks_board_activity_reply AR ON A.board_no = AR.board_no AND A.board_type = AR.board_type AND A.board_sub_type = AR.board_sub_type WHERE A.use_yn = 'Y' AND AR.USE_yN = 'Y' AND A.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND A.BOARD_SUB_TYPE = #{boardSubType} ORDER BY AR.REG_DTTM
